nodes.text: Tae Boon was a male Twi'lek who served as a second in command to Cham Syndulla of the Twi'lek freedom fighters during the Clone Wars.

When Boon's blurrg nipped at the fingers of the ARF trooper Stak, he told him in Twi'leki that his blurrg may be short-tempered, but that she was faster than his AT-RT. He later teased one of the passing ARF troopers, telling him to "try and keep up" on his AT-RT while he himself rode his blurrg.
Tae Boon was voiced by James Arnold Taylor.
